name: Drop The Bomb
description:
Drop The Bomb - is a unique game combining the strategy and clicker experiences in a multi-player mode!

Conquer countries or even continents at a single click of the mouse; enhance your defense power to not let the enemy win the day.
Produce resources to manufacture unique weapons, such as missiles and nuclear bombs. And if you've saved up a lot of the in-game currency, you can simply purchase the necessary “ingredients” from other players in the marketplace. The presidents are the ones to make decisions about today's price of resources and the way of economics!
There are no boundaries for the strategist; by targeting the industrial nations on your own or with your allies, you can obtain a free reign over the world economics. Once you get hold of the desired weapon power, you will possess unlimited might. Be careful, as the whole world may stand up in arms against you!

  • One server, one map; only the best of the best can reach the top.
  • Buy and sell freely; build the economics just the way you want.
  • Conclude alliances with friends to conquer the world together.
  • A vast scope for role play fans.
  • Simple and intuitive gameplay.
  • Marvellous accompanying music.
  • Collectible cards!
